metadata.Name: RusCode
metadata.Description: A benchmark dataset for evaluating the quality of text-to-image generation containing elements of the Russian cultural code. It consists of 1250 text prompts in Russian and their English translations.
metadata.Paper Title: RusCode: Russian Cultural Code Benchmark for Text-to-Image Generation
metadata.Abstract: In this paper, we strive to reduce this gap. We propose a RusCode benchmark for evaluating the quality of text-to-image generation containing elements of the Russian cultural code. To do this, we form a list of 19 categories that best represent the features of Russian visual culture. Our final dataset consists of 1250 text prompts in Russian and their translations into English. The prompts cover a wide range of topics, including complex concepts from art, popular culture, folk traditions, famous people's names, natural objects, scientific achievements, etc. We present the results of a human evaluation of the side-by-side comparison of Russian visual concepts representations using popular generative models.
